title: Islavale F.C.
text: Islavale Football Club are a <a href="Scotland">Scottish</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in the town of <a href="Keith%2C%20Moray">Keith</a>, <a href="Moray">Moray</a>. Founded in 1949 as a Welfare side, they joined the <a href="Scottish%20Junior%20Football%20Association">Scottish Junior Football Association</a> in 1952 and currently play in the <a href="Scottish%20Junior%20Football%20North%20Second%20Division">North Second Division</a>. The club were based at Fife Park in the Fife Keith area of the town before moving to Simpson Park in 1998. The "Vale" are near neighbours of local <a href="Highland%20Football%20League">Highland League</a> side <a href="Keith%20F.C.">Keith</a>, whose Kynoch Park ground they used to occasionally share. Team colours are red and black.
